    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:25.600

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:26.279

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:28.960
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:29.399
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:29.680
    | text      = I was texting about this earlier,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:30.760
    | text      = and that's kind of something I'm worried about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:32.680
    | text      = with my new favorite show that I've got you on, apparently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:36.680
    | text      = Everything with Phil Rosenthal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:40.079
    | text      = I'm out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:42.079
    | text      = I watched five episodes and I'm out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:44.000
    | text      = So if you guys have not watched this,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:45.579
    | text      = I recommend giving it a whirl because it is delightful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:49.000
    | text      = and charming in many ways.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:50.520
    | text      = There is a PBS show called I'll Have What Phil's Having that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:54.520
    | text      = got branched out into a Netflix series called Somebody Feed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:58.020
    | text      = Phil, where Phil Rosenthal, who's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:01.199
    | text      = the guy who created Everybody Loves Raymond,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:04.319
    | text      = is a billionaire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:05.840
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:06.319
    | text      = He goes around the world and he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:08.319
    | text      = trying to extol the virtues of traveling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:10.840
    | text      = and how food brings people together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:13.159
    | text      = And he does all these amazing, beautiful things
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:15.760
    | text      = where he goes and has these top chefs around the world
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:19.760
    | text      = make him meals, but they never in any way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:23.199
    | text      = address the fact that he's a billionaire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:24.880
    | text      = Yeah, I know, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:26.800
    | text      = Even in the I'll Have What Phil's Having,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:29.520
    | text      = the entire premise of the show, he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:31.079
    | text      = says it at the beginning of every episode,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:32.960
    | text      = you can have what I'm having.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:34.439
    | text      = Yeah, no, you can't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:35.079
    | text      = That sort of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:35.920
    | text      = No, you fucking can't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:36.920
    | text      = No, you cannot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:37.680
    | text      = You can travel if you can afford it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:39.760
    | text      = You can't travel like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:41.279
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:41.800
    | text      = You can meet people, absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:43.720
    | text      = If you can afford it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:44.680
    | text      = Well, no, but so like a parallel for me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:47.800
    | text      = I went to Greece with my family in 2007.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:51.239
    | text      = And for a week of it, we were staying in ancient Corinth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:55.000
    | text      = And it was kind of a bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:56.359
    | text      = My dad was working on archaeological dig there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:59.520
    | text      = They found something that might have been Paul's church.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:02.399
    | text      = And so we were staying in this little shack for three weeks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:06.479
    | text      = And the town was kind of a sleepy bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:08.800
    | text      = There was one street where they had shops
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:11.279
    | text      = like they had identical stuff at them,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:13.600
    | text      = a couple of decent restaurants.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:14.880
    | text      = And it was a disaster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:16.000
    | text      = But luckily, my then girlfriend, her family
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:18.720
    | text      = was going to somewhere in Italy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:21.079
    | text      = It was close enough that she came to Greece for a week.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:24.000
    | text      = That is a coincidence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:25.520
    | text      = Yeah, it was really awesome timing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:28.279
    | text      = And so she and I got a hotel in modern Corinth,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:33.239
    | text      = which is the sort of, you can't call it a metropolis,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:36.279
    | text      = but more of a city nearby.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:39.239
    | text      = You could call it an acropolis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:41.479
    | text      = No, you can't even call it that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:43.119
    | text      = There might be an agora.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:45.960
    | text      = So we went to modern Corinth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:49.520
    | text      = And we stayed there for a week away from ancient Corinth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:52.000
    | text      = Man, that was nice to get out of there a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:54.800
    | text      = But we met a guy who worked at a coffee shop
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:56.760
    | text      = there who loved Americans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:58.239
    | text      = And we made friends with him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:59.439
    | text      = And we would go back to the coffee shop and talk to him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:02.720
    | text      = And it turned bad when he was like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:04.319
    | text      = I want your phone numbers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:05.479
    | text      = Ah, ooh, a little bit of a dating misstep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:10.760
    | text      = No, it was fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:11.640
    | text      = But he wanted to stay in touch and all that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:13.720
    | text      = I was like, well, here's my email address.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:15.439
    | text      = We can stay in touch that way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:16.880
    | text      = I don't know if you're going to be able to call me from Greece.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:19.800
    | text      = Let's do pen pals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:20.840
    | text      = Let's not do text pals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:22.520
    | text      = And then he turned cold.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:24.479
    | text      = Oh, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:25.359
    | text      = Didn't want to email me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:26.520
    | text      = I don't know what the deal was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:27.760
    | text      = There was some sort of a disconnect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:29.239
    | text      = But you can do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:31.399
    | text      = Oh, email killed his father, actually.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:33.159
    | text      = Oh, that could be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:33.960
    | text      = Yeah, it was an email that did it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:35.800
    | text      = Didn't think about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:36.800
    | text      = Got a virus from an email.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:38.079
    | text      = He got a paper cut.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:39.520
    | text      = So my point is, go buck wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:43.520
    | text      = You can have those experiences all day long
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:45.359
    | text      = if you're poor and you're traveling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:46.920
    | text      = You can have these things that don't quite level up, maybe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:50.800
    | text      = Or you can fuck around and find some cool underworld bar
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:53.800
    | text      = or something like that and eat some weirdos and do heroin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:56.399
    | text      = You can do all those things if you're traveling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:58.319
    | text      = But what you can't do is what Phil Rosenthal's doing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:01.000
    | text      = You can't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:01.800
    | text      = No, I watched one episode where he took a bite of something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:05.439
    | text      = and his eyes lit up in such a way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:07.720
    | text      = that I was caught up in the moment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:08.960
    | text      = I was like, oh, my god.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:10.359
    | text      = This man truly has experienced beauty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:13.199
    | text      = And he's conveying it in a facial expression.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:15.840
    | text      = And my mirror neurons are firing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:17.840
    | text      = And I feel beauty, too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:19.560
    | text      = And then when the episode ended, I was like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:22.199
    | text      = you're a fucking millionaire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:23.880
    | text      = Well, fuck you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:24.760
    | text      = Of course you're happy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:26.199
    | text      = It's so easy to be happy when you're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:27.640
    | text      = jet-setting around the world on somebody else's dime
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:30.680
    | text      = while you're also still a millionaire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:32.920
    | text      = That's the problem with the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:35.279
    | text      = But I don't think that's the problem with Phil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:37.560
    | text      = I really think that even if he wasn't all that rich,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:39.800
    | text      = he'd still be just as happy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:42.520
    | text      = I think that's just his demeanor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:44.439
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:45.159
    | text      = There's no way to prove a counterfactual.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:47.319
    | text      = But I think the thing that draws me to the show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:50.800
    | text      = is that beautiful love of life that he embodies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:54.199
    | text      = And there's an innocence to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:57.720
    | text      = And it's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:58.880
    | text      = But at the same time, you can't take class out of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:01.119
    | text      = And it gets really grating when people present it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:04.199
    | text      = in the same way the capitalist fantasy of grind at this job
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:07.800
    | text      = where you're not making enough to live.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:09.479
    | text      = And eventually, you pay your cards right, all this stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:12.279
    | text      = Maybe you'll be one of those people who capitalizes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:14.520
    | text      = off capitalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:15.640
    | text      = In the same way, this show presents a scenario
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:17.840
    | text      = where it's like, you can do all this stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:20.039
    | text      = And you fucking can't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:21.359
    | text      = There's just a delusion embedded.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:23.720
    | text      = I don't know why I needed to go off on that jam.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:25.920
    | text      = I just don't want to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:27.039
    | text      = We're all off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:28.319
    | text      = We're on jags all day today.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:30.279
    | text      = Well, we're recording much later than normal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:32.800
    | text      = Sour beer is acting weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:34.039
    | text      = But it is growing on me a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:35.439
    | text      = It kind of is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:36.520
    | text      = The first sip was rough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
